question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. checkout counter
B. bananas
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The checkout counter is in the immediate foreground where the person is standing, while the bananas are hanging on the wall further back, making their depth relationship very obvious.
